CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Centrally manage branding for your organization
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing new branding and management capabilities that you can use to improve consistency across your sites and pages.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Centrally manage branding for your organization
OldVersion.description: We’re introducing new branding and management capabilities that you can use to improve consistency across your sites and pages.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream video recordings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing the ability to record and insert Stream video recordings in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon you will be able to record a video of yourself, your screen or both, directly from Outlook and insert the recording in your email.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Stream video recordings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: We're introducing the ability to record and insert Stream video recordings in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon you will be able to record a video of yourself, your screen or both, directly from Outlook and insert the recording in your email.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
CurrentVersion.description: The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
OldVersion.description: The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections - Manage your organization’s brand in the new brand center
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing new branding and management capabilities that you can use to improve consistency across your Viva Connections desktop, mobile, and tablet experiences.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections - Manage your organization’s brand in the new brand center
OldVersion.description: We’re introducing new branding and management capabilities that you can use to improve consistency across your Viva Connections desktop, mobile, and tablet experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Introducing custom fonts for SharePoint and Viva Connections Desktop
CurrentVersion.description: Fonts are more than just letters and symbols, and we've heard you. We're bringing font customization to your SharePoint and Viva Connections experiences with the brand center. Express your personality, style, and brand by adding custom fonts to your sites and related experiences.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Introducing custom fonts for SharePoint and Viva Connections Desktop
OldVersion.description: Fonts are more than just letters and symbols, and we've heard you. We're bringing font customization to your SharePoint and Viva Connections experiences with the brand center. Express your personality, style, and brand by adding custom fonts to your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create themes for SharePoint and Viva Connections in brand center
CurrentVersion.description: We're bringing a new theme creation experience into the brand center, allowing you to easily create and manage themes for your sites and related experiences.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create themes for SharePoint and Viva Connections in brand center
OldVersion.description: We're bringing a new theme creation experience into the brand center, allowing you to easily create and manage themes for your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Create themes for SharePoint in brand center
CurrentVersion.description: We're bringing a new theme creation experience into the brand center, allowing you to easily create and manage themes for your sites and related experiences.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Create themes for SharePoint in brand center
OldVersion.description: We're bringing a new theme creation experience into the brand center, allowing you to easily create and manage themes for your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
CurrentVersion.description: To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
OldVersion.description: To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
CurrentVersion.description: To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
OldVersion.description: To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Revamped Resources on mobile and tablet
CurrentVersion.description: The Resources section on Viva Connections mobile and tablet will show content from the recently revamped Resources section on Viva Connections desktop.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Revamped Resources on mobile and tablet
OldVersion.description: The Resources section on Viva Connections mobile and tablet will show content from the recently revamped Resources section on Viva Connections desktop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage content in Workplace Search
CurrentVersion.description: As users search in office.com, sharepoint.com, bing at work they will find content from Viva Engage in the search results. We will first start with question posts and then roll out discussion posts from Engage.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage content in Workplace Search
OldVersion.description: As users search in office.com, sharepoint.com, bing at work they will find content from Viva Engage in the search results. We will first start with question posts and then roll out discussion posts from Engage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options to control participants' ability to admit attendees from meeting lobby
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting organizers will have options in the meeting settings on who can admit attendees from the lobby into the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options to control participants' ability to admit attendees from meeting lobby
OldVersion.description: Meeting organizers will have options in the meeting settings on who can admit attendees from the lobby into the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints-Archive File Support for Mac Endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) for endpoints will inspect the content of every archive file when it is created, modified, or read. After inspection, all supported file types in the archive file will be classified and evaluated against active DLP policies and the defined enforcement action will be enforced on the file.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints-Archive File Support for Mac Endpoints
OldVersion.description: DLP will inspect the content of every archive file when it is created, modified, or read. On inspection, all the files (of supported file format) within the archive file will be classified and evaluated against active DLP policies. Afterwards, the archive file will get the applicable auditing / enforcement policy applied to it based on the following logic.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Automatic summary of documents on file-open in Word
CurrentVersion.description: When you open a document, Copilot will generate a summary in the Word window. You can hide the summary or open the Copilot chat pane to ask specific questions about the document.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Automatic summary of documents on file-open in Word
OldVersion.description: When you open a document, Copilot will generate a summary in the Word window. You can hide the summary or open the Copilot chat pane to ask specific questions about the document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Microsoft 365 Groups scoping in Teams DLP policy extend protection to 1:1/n chats
CurrentVersion.description: When scoping policies to Microsoft 365 Groups in Teams DLP policies, members of Teams standard and shared channel chats associated with the groups are currently protected by the policies. This change will automatically extend the protection to standard/shared channels chats in other Microsfot 365 Groups and 1:1/n (non-channel) chats. There is no longer a need to add users, security groups or other Microsoft 365 groups to protect these chats, except for customers that have enabled optical character recognition (OCR) in Teams chat.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Microsoft 365 Groups scoping in Teams DLP policy extend protection to 1:1/n chats
OldVersion.description: When scoping policies to Microsoft 365 Groups in Teams DLP policies, members of Teams standard and shared channel chats associated with the groups are currently protected by the policies. This change will automatically extend the protection to standard/shared channels chats in other Microsfot 365 Groups and 1:1/n (non-channel) chats. There is no longer a need to add users, security groups or other Microsoft 365 groups to protect these chats, except for customers that have enabled optical character recognition (OCR) in Teams chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background on Teams panels
CurrentVersion.description: Administrators can upload and set custom background images for Teams panels through the Teams admin center, enabling them to reflect their organization's branding. This feature will be available for Teams Rooms Pro and Teams Shared Devices licensed panels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background on Teams panels
OldVersion.description: Administrators can upload and set custom background images for Teams panels through the Teams admin center, enabling them to reflect their organization's branding. This feature will be available for Teams Rooms Pro and Teams Shared Devices licensed panels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Mesh app on Meta Quest headsets supports hand interactions
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Mesh app users on Meta Quest 2, 3, and Pro headsets can now use their hands to use the app, move around in event environments, and interact with objects. Motion controllers continue to be supported, and users can switch between using controllers or their hands while using the app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Mesh app on Meta Quest headsets supports hand interactions
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Mesh app users on Meta Quest 2, 3, and Pro headsets can now use their hands to use the app, move around in event environments, and interact with objects. Motion controllers continue to be supported, and users can switch between using controllers or their hands while using the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New policy for voice and face enrollment defaulting to 'On'
CurrentVersion.description: The new policy gives IT admins enhanced flexibility with distinct settings for voice and face enrollment. This adjustment provides greater control over managing these features, allowing organizations to tailor to their needs. Voice and face enrollment will be enabled by default, enabling voice isolation and speaker recognition in meeting rooms and enhancing intelligent meeting recaps and Copilot for meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Network Strength icon to understand strength of your network
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly understand strength of your network along with suggestions to conserve bandwidth if you are experiencing networking issues.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Network Strength icon to understand strength of your network
OldVersion.description: Quickly understand strength of your network along with suggestions to conserve bandwidth if you are experiencing networking issues.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updates to mail sharing functionality with Cloud Policy Service when setting "Turn off sharing recommendation"
CurrentVersion.description: Updates to the office Cloud Policy Service setting "Turn off sharing recommendation" will disable the ability for users to share folders with individual users. Currently, the policy blocked users' ability to update default and anonymous permission levels for shared folders. This functionality will remain and will not be changed. The current policy and how it works with calendar sharing will not be impacted by this change and will remain as implemented. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Sync - Shared Item Delete and Local Mass Delete Confirmation Dialogs
CurrentVersion.description: We are shipping an items delete confirmation that will trigger when the user is about to delete shared items. This UI format will also replace the existing mass delete experience. These confirmations will occur when files are deleted from File Explorer when the user is running OneDrive and not paused.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sort by Flag option
CurrentVersion.description: We are adding support for sort by flag status, flag due date and flag start date.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Checking feedback policy across all accounts
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, when we determine whether a user is entitled to submit feedback, we only look at the feedback policy for their primary (global) account. Going forward, we are going to make the feedback policy check more restrictive which is more secure. We'll be looking at feedback policies for all users' accounts and basing their eligibility off the most restrictive policy value found. For example, if any of the users' accounts have Feedback disabled by a policy, we won't show the Feedback button in the Help tab of the ribbon for any of their accounts. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Project for the web and Roadmap for GCCH
CurrentVersion.description: Project for the web and Roadmap features are rolling out to Project GGCH customers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Unified Create button in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: This feature brings a new way for users to create posts, communities etc. through a centralized creation button in Viva Engage. Currently, Engage users need to go to different locations in the application for different creation types - a post, community, etc. Starting in October 2024, a Viva Engage user will be able to create the different types of content already enabled for them, using a centralized creation button. This new feature eases the process of creation and helps users quickly discover the various creation options they are licensed to use.
